#anime

Simplified British MBT gun sight with a range scale

This sight is based on the historical gun sight that Chieftain tanks used. It is supposed to have a lot of markings, but I removed most of them in order to optimize this sight for war thunder's game play. The remaining dots and lines have no practical use. They're only for aesthetics.
Aiming with the dot could be a little uncomfortable compared to the default crosshair, because it's harder to see adjustments while aiming for weakspots. If you have any problems with it, do tell me in the comments.
The range scale is in the middle. ...
